attributes.action: examine the feasibility of stablishing a package of grandparent rights - similar to paternity rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would alleviate the burden on maternity services, provide continuity, truly sensitive midwifery, meet calls for home care and cut down costs of healthcare professionals travelling. Grandparents have experience in caring often undertake a supportive role - what's wrong with paying them to do this ?
